resources.string: "My News" uses the news published by the New York Times so you can be updated everyday at every time about what is happening in the world.

You can move through the different sections using the different labels you can see under the main bar. In each section you can see a short summary of the different articles (and you can scroll down to see even more). You can click on each article for see the detail of article.
The app stores all the articles you have read. You will see that the summary of the article changes to green style when the article has been read.

You can search specific articles according to different categories (Arts, Business, Entrepreneurs, Politics, Sports and Travel), Search Queries Term, Begin Date and End date for more precisions. For that, press the - Search button - (the glass in the main bar)-

You can keep updated every day with new articles using the notifications functionality. To use it, click the - Notifications - button (displayed after tapping the 3 dots button in the main bar), choose the categories, introduce a search query if you\'d like and switch the button on. The app will send you a notification every day at 12 h with new articles.
